card.name: Bronze-Arm Tribe
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Natural Snare
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

card.name: Faerie Life
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Jasmine, Mist Faerie
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Mendelssohn
card.text: ■ Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put all Dragons revealed this way into your mana zone tapped and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: General Briking, Super Deluxe
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Revolution Change ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may look at the top 4 cards of your deck, You may choose a multicolored creature from them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Katsuemon Buster, Blade 3
card.text: ■ Revolution Change ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, one of your creatures gets "speed attacker" until the End Step

card.name: Ryusei the Earth
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone or when this creature is discarded by one of your opponent's spell effect or creature ability, look at the top card of your deck. Put it into your hand or mana zone.

card.name: Faerie Trap
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Reveal the top card of your deck then choose one of the following. :► Put that card into your mana zone. :► Choose one your opponent's creatures that costs less than the revealed card and put it into its owner's mana zone.
